rukus.text: Noah skazav, "Miy Lord, vony ne pidkoryalysya meni, ta proslidkuvaly za tsymy khto navitʹ bilʹshe korumpuvalysʹ koly blahoslovlenyy z hroshamy ta ditʹmy
Vony skazaly, `do ne pokydayutʹ vashykh bohiv. Ne pokynʹte Wadd, Suwaa`, Yaghouth, Ya`ooq, ta Nasr
Vony pryzvely do pomylky bahato. Tomu, dozvolenyy bezputnyy porynayutʹ bilʹsh hlybokyy u vtratu
Vnaslidok yikhnikh hrikhiv vony buly potonuti ta buly pryznacheni do hellfire. Vony ne znayshly helpers shchob zakhystyty yikh z BOHA
Noah takozh skazav, "Miy Lord, ne vid'yidzhayutʹ yedynyy disbeliever na zemli
Dlya yakshcho vy dozvolyayete yim, vony tilʹky pryzvedutʹ do pomylky vashi sluzhbovtsi ta rozhayutʹ nichoho ale bezputnyy disbelievers
Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni ta moyi batʹky, ta budʹ khto khto vstupaye miy domashniy yak viruyuchyy, ta vesʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam. Ale ne dayutʹ disbelievers budʹ shcho ale znyshchennya
